1180820.name: Escape!
1180820.description:
Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape! Escape!

Anyway, let's "Escape!"

Game

"Escape!" is Tag action game.
Your mission is to escape to the goal!
Watch out for the Enemy chasing from the left of the screen!
This game sounds excite with comfortable operation.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Operation

・Move(← →, AD)
・Jump(↑, W)
・Dash(B, Shift)
* If you connect the joypad before starting the game, you can play with the joypad.

Update

2019/11/19 Add 2 Levels.

2020/02/03 Add 4 Levels.
